greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Numerator of integral from 0 to 1 of (1 + x^2)^n, in lowest terms.
example: For n=3 the integral is 96/35, so a(3) = 96.
program: (PARI) {a(n) = if( n<0, 0, numerator( subst( intformal((1 + x^2)^n), x, 1)))}
results.author: _Michael Somos_, Nov 06 2002
